name: 6th Generation Pokémon Wondercard File
summary: A WC6 file contains a wondercard, which is a digital card used by 6th generation Pokémon games for Nintendo 3DS (N3DS). It stores information about a Pokémon or an item, which includes the name, ID, and description of the wondercard. WC6 files are distributed at special real-life Pokémon events but may also be shared online by Pokémon gamers.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
